divs: Sighting DetailsNo sound as two objects pased over head slowly. Red and abmer lighting on underside of both. My stepson, his girl friend and my wife were sitting outside talking. My stepson saw both objects eather come out of the woods or from over the hill. At first he through it was a sky rocks but they kept climing and madev no sound. i saw the objects as theyb passed over head and washed until they disapeared from view. Both kept the same distand and same speed. Both were steady as they moved,both moved from South to South East
Summary: Two oval shaped objects came out of the woods or over a hill about half mile from where we were standing.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Samobor
This sighting has never been favorited.
